title: Virus
content:
**Virus** is is the type foundry of [Jonathan Barnbrook](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000242/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jonathan%20Barnbrook). You may rember Jonathan from such [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000242/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emigre) fonts as [Exocet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000242/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Exocet), [Mason](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000242/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mason) and [Priori](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000242/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Priori). But he has multitude of other counter culture typefaces stockpiled.

Web site: [http://www.virusfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000242/http:/www.virusfonts.com/ "http://www.virusfonts.com/")
author: James Grieshaber
